event.name: ADDON_FISH
event.text:
FTL: FISHIER THAN LIGHT Developed by: Arc Currently Enabled.
FTL Fishing, what more do I need to say. Over 60 fish, all with unique uses and effects.
To enable Fishier Than Light, go to the Multiverse Forums and visit the addon section!

The station is running on old outdated technology, and as such you'll need to teleport aboard in order to access the store.
In order to board the station you need to move 1 or more crew members into your piloting room and then the teleportation button next to the enemy ship box. To retrieve your crew bring them into the teleportation room on the station and press the same button.

eventButton.name: UI_FISH_BOARD
eventButton.inactiveTooltip: You have no crew in your piloting or the station's teleporter, you cannot teleport.

textList.name: FISH_ARRIVE_TEXT
textList.text: You arrive at the outpost, a small station dedicated to space fishing.
You arrive at the beacon and are greeted by a space fishing outpost.
You've arrived at the beacon, theres a small outpost here dedicated to space fishing.

event.name: FISHING_STORE_INSTORE
event.text: You've arrived at the old fishing store. It appears they have a bounty board setup for fish, The rewards appear quite valuable, but you'll have to hunt down a specific fish for each bounty.

choice.text: You can use the medbay to heal your crew

event.name: FISHING_BOUNTY_BOARD
event.text: There are a number of bounties available.
